text:
I haven't tried this, but I'm guessing you could connect to <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/cms/pages|/cms/v3/pages/site-pages> inside a serverless function (or private app) and return back the page data received from HubSpot's api. Then access the serverless function endpoint within your template?

However the response from HubSpot is section data in JSON though so I think you'd end up having to do quite a bit of parsing before having access to updating HTML directly
Best approach is to check query parameter value from  `request.query_dict`    or you can use client side Javascript to check parameter value and can block certain sections throughout the site
